conversion_verification.notes: The model successfully converts the 2D floor plan into a 3D isometric cutaway with clear wall geometry and interior depth.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with solid wall geometry, clear floor planes, and a clean cutaway perspective.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity to the original layout. Room adjacencies and wall proportions are nearly perfect; stairs and window placements align accurately.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement follows the 2D cues closely, including the dining set, living room arrangement, and kitchen counters.

visual_clarity.notes: High contrast between elements with clear lighting. Background is clean and neutral.

detected_errors.description: The wall between the wash area and the toilet is slightly more curved than the straight partition shown in the 2D plan.

summary: A highly accurate and geometrically faithful 3D conversion that maintains virtually all floor plan details in a clean isometric render.
